Sean Rioux
  • Home

Hey, I'm Sean Rioux.

I'm a web entrepreneur, programmer, and advocate. I believe in the social potential of a more open and humane world wide web. In-fact, I've made it my mission. I know, I've got my work cut out for me. I'm working on it.

This is my website where I share my thoughts on the current and future state of the web. You'll also find my portfolio of contributions and products.

At the moment I'm in build mode, however, I'm certainly open to discussing worthwhile projects or causes. If something you see here interests you, it's not hard to find me.
